masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I saw you fly last night. Out the window. And come back with your costume. I took pictures. You're gonna do my chores for a MONTH, or I'm telling Mom and Dad everything. Unless... you take me on a patrol? Just one? PLEASE? I wanna be a hero too!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Handle your sibling's blackmail attempt
  • Decide: give in, negotiate, or come clean?
  • Taking them on patrol is dangerousâ€”but so is their anger
